title: [Diagnostic and predictive capabilities of the quantification of C-reactive protein in patients with community-acquired pneumonia].
abstract: According to numerous researches the authors emphasize the importance of the quantification of C-reactive protein in patients with community-acquired pneumonia. We gave an analysis of different publications on the given issue. We came to conclusion that available laboratory kits for the quantification of C-reactive protein in blood serum, including instant diagnosis, allow considering the given method as a method of common use for military-medical facilities.
